name: Deep Fried Mushrooms
author: Angel Marcelino
summary: Button mushrooms are battered and fried in oil for an irresistible snack. These are great for watching sports.
ingredients: 2 cups oil for frying, or as needed
directions: In a medium bowl, stir together the flour and garlic salt
Mix in egg and water until smooth
Heat the oil in a large deep skillet over medium-high heat
Test to see if oil is hot by frying a drop of batter
If it sizzles and floats to the top, the oil is ready
Dip mushrooms into the batter and then place in the hot oil
Fry a few at a time so they are not crowded, until golden brown, 3 to 5 minutes
Remove from oil with a slotted spoon and drain on paper towels
